name: Poopshitters: the game
description:
This game is made as a tribute to my favorite band, the Poopshitters.

Music credits go to,

The Poopshitters, of course:  https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCto92GlgWaFa5Ua1vxVjJ-A

The Peepissers: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCc8eHQjQgub2WjfOj4lLSLQ/videos

and any other music included 

I mean no hate to any bands in this game and it's purely made for entertainment purposes. I used footage from one of the Poopshitter's live concerts that was uploaded to their youtube channel
